original: @426a yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @426a yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Perfectly Awakened One, together with the community of hearers, seven times.

original: dgra dang 'jigs pa kun las brgal //
analyzed: dgra dang 'jigs pa kun las brgal //
translated: Having crossed over all enemies and dangers,

original: rnam par gzigs ni gzi brjid che //
analyzed: rnam par gzigs ni gzi brjid che //

original: rdzu 'phrul ngo bo gtsug tor ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul ngo bo gtsug tor ro //
translated: with miraculous power, the essence, and the uṣṇīṣa.🔽The wisdom of Viśvabhū, the power of Krakucchanda,🔽the splendor of Kanakamuni, the qualities of Kāśyapa,

original: thams cad skyob pa'i shes rab dang // log dad sel ba'i stobs nyid dang / gser thub kyi ni rlabs pa dang // 'od srung gi ni yon tan dang // sh'akya thub pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //
analyzed: thams cad skyob pa'i shes rab dang // log dad sel ba'i stobs nyid dang / gser thub kyi ni rlabs pa dang // 'od srung gi ni yon tan dang // sh'akya thub pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //

original: bdag ni rtag tu bde bar shog /
analyzed: bdag ni rtag tu bde bar shog /

original: pa ra se n+ya pra marda n'i ye sv'ah'a /
analyzed: pa ra se n+ya pra marda n'i ye sv'ah'a /

original: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig pa chen mo rdzogs so ////
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig pa chen mo rdzogs so ////
translated: The great Aparājitā vidyā is complete.
